Packages 
Package Description
se.jkrau.mclib
A powerful code injection framework that allows for easy instrumenting and transforming of any class.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft
All of the components for "crafting", or transforming java classes.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft.asm
All crafts in this package utilize the ASM library.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft.asm.basic
The basic crafts that use the ASM library.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft.asm.orm
The implementation of ORMDriver in ASM.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft.orm
A powerful craft package that takes your written java code, converts and injects into your target class's methods without the need of learning any form of java bytecode.
se.jkrau.mclib.craft.orm.annotations
The annotations in this class help you define where you should inject your code.
se.jkrau.mclib.loader
All the components for the Loader
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm
Provides a small and fast bytecode manipulation framework.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.commons
Provides some useful class and method adapters.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.signature
Provides support for type signatures.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.tree
Provides an ASM visitor that constructs a tree representation of the classes it visits.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis
Provides a framework for static code analysis based on the asm.tree package.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.util
Provides ASM visitors that can be useful for programming and debugging purposes.
se.jkrau.mclib.org.objectweb.asm.xml
Provides SAX 2.0 adapters for ASM visitors to convert classes to and from XML.
se.jkrau.mclib.utils
A probably going to be useless utilities package.
